text: Allegro Brillant, Op. 92, is a composition written for Piano four hands by Felix Mendelssohn consisting of a theme in A major, written in 1841 and dedicated to Clara Schumann."Felix Mendelssohn, 'Allegro Brillant', Op. 92", classicalconnect.com ==References== ==External links== * Category:Compositions by Felix Mendelssohn Category:Compositions for piano four-hands Category:Variations Category:1841 compositions Category:Compositions in A major Category:Music dedicated to family or friends
title: Allegro Brillant (Mendelssohn)
